channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- openshift

item.title: CVE-2016-9592|2024-08-06T02:59:02.472Z -- unspecified -- openshift
item.description: openshift before versions 3.3.1.11, 3.2.1.23, 3.4 is vulnerable to a flaw when a volume fails to detach, which causes the delete operation to fail with 'VolumeInUse' error. Since the delete operation is retried every 30 seconds for each volume, this could lead to a denial of service attack as the number of API requests being sent to the cloud-provider exceeds the API's rate-limit.
